overview:
Search engine optimisation and internet marketing specialist from Manchester, UK.

Making websites and hunting traffic since 1999.

The last six years have been spent working for various internet start-ups and companies, focusing on SEO, delivering web traffic and sales.

In 2006 started work for financial services/insurance lead generation company Cavendish.

Joined VentureBase in 2007 as senior SEO for for various different web projects, including TopSkips.com, HousesForCashUK and PersonalLoansMadeEasy.

In 2008 Colin started work as senior SEO for ThinkMoney.com, developing the site into a successful financial multi-channel web portal, working in niches such as debt, loans, mortgages and insurance.

In July 2012 Colin joined search agency Banc Media as SEO manager.

In his spare time Colin runs various websites, and enjoys helping other people to learn how to code, make websites and start off in internet marketing.
